main event: A bright blue glow traveling at jet speed was observed by a C-47 USAF crew over Paoli, Oklahoma on 28 October 1952, and it burst into fragments after a 10-second observation.
interesting points: The object was described as a bright blue glow traveling in a straight line at high speed., The object was sighted at about 500 feet altitude., The official description noted that the object made no sound., Confirmed by USAF personnel, the sighting was corroborated by multiple witnesses in the aircraft., The sighting lasted approximately 10 seconds before the object disintegrated.
witness description: USAF crew members aboard a C-47
